messages.title: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.
messages.content: The last few years have been frustrating. I get it. I've been just as frustrated as you. We've had three years of a hung parliament that agrees on nothing except more arguments. But we don't have to go on like this. Together, we can end the doom and gloom.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we can leave the EU by the end of January.
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.
20,000 extra police officers. With the powers they need to keep us safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Your postal vote can secure a majority government – if you vote Conservative. Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority.

issues.brexitEurope: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we can leave the EU by the end of January.
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.
issues.lawCrime: 20,000 extra police officers. With the powers they need to keep us safe.

endorsements.endorsement: So I'm asking you to use your postal vote for Jonathan Djanogly in the Huntingdon Constituency. Let's end the arguments. Let's get on with the country's priorities. And let's unleash Britain's potential.

quotes.text: The country needs a majority government. And you can secure it with your postal vote.

examples: More funding for every pupil in every school.
Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority.
The great thing about a majority government is that it can get stuff done. And that's exactly what we'll do.
But we don't have to go on like this. Together, we can end the doom and gloom.
Britain has spent too long going nowhere, spinning round in a hamster wheel of doom.
Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
So I'm asking you to use your postal vote for Jonathan Djanogly in the Huntingdon Constituency.
Britain has spent too long going nowhere, spinning round in a hamster wheel of doom.
